block.buddycards.kinetic_chamber.desc: Uses nearby explosions as energy to forge items out of blocks of luminis and crimson luminis
item.buddycards.buddysteel_power_meter.d: §7Checks progress on your collection, or for a specific set when you put a card in your offhand
item.buddycards.luminis_ring.desc: When equipped, will make an extra card in each pack foiled
item.buddycards.zylex_ring.desc: When equipped, will give an extra roll when grading
item.buddycards.zylex_power_meter.desc: §7Checks progress on your S grade collection of perfectly graded cards
item.buddycards.blank_buddysteel_medal.d: §7Empower it by holding a card from a completed set in your offhand and right clicking
item.buddycards.blank_buddysteel_medal.f: This set cannot empower a medal
You don't have enough cards in this set to empower the medal
item.buddycards.blank_buddysteel_medal.s: Your Buddysteel Medal has been empowered by your
item.buddycards.buddysteel_medal.name: Earned by
item.buddycards.buddysteel_medal.set: for collecting all Buddycards in the
item.buddycards.grading_sleeve.desc: §7Can grade a Buddycard in your offhand one of 5 grades
item.buddycards.battle_sleeve.desc: §7Can be put on a Buddycard in your offhand and will keep track of battle stats
item.buddycards.golden_grading_sleeve.de: §7Can grade a Buddycard in your offhand one of 5 grades, somewhat better odds for better grades
§7Can grade a Buddycard in your offhand one of 5 grades, better odds for better grades, infinitely reusable
item.buddycards.luminis_sleeve.desc: §7Can give a Buddycard in your offhand a foil treatment
item.buddycards.zylex_grading_sleeve.des: §7Can grade a Buddycard in your offhand one of 5 grades, very high odds for better grades.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base1.tooltip: One day he'll grow up to be a tree!
item.buddycards.buddycard_base2.tooltip: Doesn't actually like rock, prefers heavy metal.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base6.tooltip: One of the most useless doctors.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base7.tooltip: She doesn't like being called a cow.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base8.tooltip: She's the prettiest form of water!
item.buddycards.buddycard_base9.tooltip: Don't listen to his sister he's pretty too.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base13.tooltip: Good boy, the best of the boys.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base14.tooltip: Don't leave anything on the table for her.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base15.tooltip: Let the cash flow! The richest buddy!
item.buddycards.buddycard_base16.tooltip: Loved by the villager otaku community.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base18.tooltip: Don't eat her! She's too precious!
item.buddycards.buddycard_base21.tooltip: He's self conscious about his face.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base23.tooltip: Doesn't like heavy metal, prefers rock.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base24.tooltip: She can be a little pushy sometimes.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base27.tooltip: Some folks are about to be roasted.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base28.tooltip: It's not a phase! This is who I am...
item.buddycards.buddycard_base31.tooltip: Down, down you go, into the below...
item.buddycards.buddycard_base32.tooltip: Be patient, they take their time.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base33.tooltip: Might be broken, but he's right twice a day.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base34.tooltip: Might be lost, but she knows her way back.
item.buddycards.buddycard_base35.tooltip: This isn't even my final regeneration!
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether2.toolti: Knows a bit of dark magic.
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether5.toolti: He's a real unit! An absolute chonker!
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether6.toolti: Nobody really knows what they're made of.
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether7.toolti: As dramatic as he is magmatic.
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether9.toolti: One day he'll grow up to be, a bigger shroom!
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether12.toolt: Dig straight down, she'll catch you!
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether13.toolt: He's very proud of his swordsmanship.
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether14.toolt: A bit of a loose canon.
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether16.toolt: Will always help in a pinch!
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether20.toolt: She's been spitting fire for years.
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether24.toolt: Mad not all three faces fit on the card.
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether26.toolt: Legends say their beam reaches deep space.
item.buddycards.buddycard_nether27.toolt: Legends say they're the strongest buddy.
item.buddycards.buddycard_end1.tooltip: Some think she's made of cheese.
item.buddycards.buddycard_end2.tooltip: They're a bit of a collector themselves.
item.buddycards.buddycard_end4.tooltip: Uses contacts, they actually have green eyes.
item.buddycards.buddycard_end5.tooltip: A very small horse, I think.
item.buddycards.buddycard_end6.tooltip: Not a fan of fancy minecarts.
item.buddycards.buddycard_end7.tooltip: Loves flying, but doesn't have any wings.
item.buddycards.buddycard_end8.tooltip: He's read every book and knows every word.
item.buddycards.buddycard_end11.tooltip: Not to be confused with candles.
item.buddycards.buddycard_end12.tooltip: He's gonna go to the moon!
item.buddycards.buddycard_end14.tooltip: Doesn't look like an actual flower.
item.buddycards.buddycard_end16.tooltip: He's the best at at karaoke
item.buddycards.buddycard_end18.tooltip: You'll see him in your nightmares!
item.buddycards.buddycard_end19.tooltip: The all seeing eye. He sees stuff.
item.buddycards.buddycard_end22.tooltip: He hoards all kinds of stuff.
item.buddycards.buddycard_holiday1.toolt: Everybody thinks she's bad luck. Well she is.
item.buddycards.buddycard_holiday2.toolt: Spooky Scary! Spooky Scary! Spooky Scary!
item.buddycards.buddycard_holiday5.toolt: All dressed up for the holidays!
item.buddycards.buddycard_holiday6.toolt: To keep you warm through the cold!
enchantment.buddycards.extra_page.desc: Signifigantly adds more slots to a binder.
enchantment.buddycards.buddy_boost.desc: Upgrades the effects of a Buddysteel Medal
enchantment.buddycards.recovery.desc: Makes cooldowns on gear effects shorter

battles.ability.buddycards.milk_maid.log: Status effects are cleared by Milk Maid
battles.ability.buddycards.snowball_figh: When you play Snowbelle, your opponent loses 1 life.

Animal buddies gain 1 power from Feeding Time

battles.ability.buddycards.play_fetch.lo: draws a card from Play Fetch

battles.ability.buddycards.lazy_cat.log: Yin gains 2 power and is put to sleep by Lazy Cat
battles.ability.buddycards.gilded_gift.d: When you play Bling, your food buddies gain 1 power.
battles.ability.buddycards.gilded_gift.l: Food buddies gain 1 power from Gilded Gift
battles.ability.buddycards.rich_trade.de: When you play Emerelda, draw as many cards as you can.

battles.ability.buddycards.delicious_des: When Treatsy dies, you gain 3 life.

battles.ability.buddycards.sweet_treat.d: When Melony dies, you gain 2 life.
battles.ability.buddycards.spook_em.desc: When Spoopy attacks, an opposing buddy loses 1 power.

battles.ability.buddycards.xp_farm.desc: When Knall-Edgy kills a buddy, your enchantable buddies gain 1 power.
battles.ability.buddycards.xp_farm.log: Enchantable buddies gain 1 power from XP Farm

battles.ability.buddycards.reforge.log: Metal buddies gain 1 power from Reforge

is returned to hand by Push Back

Random cards are played by Grand Creation

Cards are combined with Creator to increase its power by

battles.ability.buddycards.smeltdown.log: Buddies are destroyed and Meltor gains
battles.ability.buddycards.flaming_forge: When you play a fire buddy, Meltor and your metal buddies gain 2 power.
Meltor and metal buddies gain 2 power from Flaming Forge
battles.ability.buddycards.thick_thicket: At the start of your turn, if Angsty Saps has no adjacent empty spots, they gain 2 power.
Angsty Saps gained 2 power from Thick Thicket
battles.ability.buddycards.courage_chime: Whem Aimy dies, your buddies gain 1 power.
Buddies gain 1 power from Courage Chime

battles.ability.buddycards.drip_drop.log: Dropper is returned to hand by Drip Drop

Tick gains 1 power and redstone buddies are powered by Pulse Extender
When played, Tock gains power equal to the turn number divided by 2 rounded down.
